statements: SELECT * FROM transaction_history ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_type, transaction_amount FROM transaction_history WHERE transaction_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM transaction_history WHERE transaction_type = 'Deposit';
SELECT transaction_id, asset_id FROM transaction_history ORDER BY asset_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM transaction_history WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT * FROM transaction_history WHERE transaction_type='Purchase';
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date FROM transaction_history WHERE transaction_type='Sale' ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT asset_id, SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_amount FROM transaction_history GROUP BY asset_id;
SELECT COUNT(transaction_id) AS total_transactions, MIN(transaction_amount) AS min_transaction_amount, MAX(transaction_amount) AS max_transaction_amount FROM transaction_history;

SELECT asset_id, AVG(transaction_amount) AS avg_transaction_amount, COUNT(*) AS total_transactions FROM transaction_history WHERE transaction_amount > 1000 GROUP BY asset_id HAVING avg_transaction_amount > 5000 ORDER BY total_transactions DESC;
SELECT * FROM transaction_history;
SELECT transaction_id, asset_name, transaction_amount FROM transaction_history WHERE transaction_amount > 1000;
SELECT asset_name, balance FROM asset_balances WHERE asset_name = 'Bitcoin';
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date FROM transaction_history ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM transaction_history t INNER JOIN asset_balances a ON t.asset_name = a.asset_name;
SELECT * FROM transaction_history WHERE transaction_amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT asset_name, sum(balance) as total_balance FROM asset_balances GROUP BY asset_name HAVING total_balance > 50000 ORDER BY total_balance DESC;
SELECT asset_name, balance FROM asset_balances WHERE balance < 5000 OR asset_name = 'Bitcoin' ORDER BY balance ASC;
SELECT transaction_id, MAX(transaction_amount) FROM transaction_history GROUP BY transaction_id ORDER BY MAX(transaction_amount) DESC;
SELECT * FROM transaction_history WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31' ORDER BY transaction_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM transaction_history WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_timestamp ASC;
SELECT asset_id, amount FROM transaction_history WHERE asset_id = 3;
SELECT balance_id, balance FROM balance ORDER BY balance_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM asset WHERE asset_name LIKE '%Bitcoin%';
SELECT AVG(amount) AS average_amount FROM transaction_history;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, transaction_timestamp FROM transaction_history WHERE amount > 100 ORDER BY transaction_timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT asset_name, balance FROM asset JOIN balance ON asset.asset_id = balance.asset_id WHERE asset_name = 'Bitcoin';
SELECT * FROM transaction_history WHERE amount < 50 AND transaction_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT asset_name, SUM(balance) AS total_balance FROM asset JOIN balance ON asset.asset_id = balance.asset_id GROUP BY asset_name ORDER BY total_balance DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_transactions, MIN(amount) AS min_amount, MAX(amount) AS max_amount FROM transaction_history;
SELECT * FROM transaction_history WHERE transaction_id = 1;
SELECT asset_id, amount FROM transaction_history WHERE amount > 100;
SELECT asset_name, asset_type FROM asset ORDER BY asset_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_account WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT transaction_id, amount, transaction_date FROM transaction_history WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT * FROM transaction_history ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, username FROM user_account WHERE email = 'example@example.com';
SELECT asset_name, balance FROM asset_balance JOIN asset ON asset_balance.asset_id = asset.asset_id WHERE asset_type = 'Crypto';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS transaction_count FROM transaction_history GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 5;
SELECT asset_name, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM transaction_history JOIN asset ON transaction_history.asset_id = asset.asset_id GROUP BY asset_name ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM transactions
SELECT transaction_date, amount FROM transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'debit'
SELECT id, transaction_date, amount FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000
SELECT transaction_type, COUNT(*) FROM transactions GROUP BY transaction_type
SELECT asset_name, balance FROM assets WHERE balance < 0
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT asset_name, asset_type, balance FROM assets WHERE owner_id = 1001;
SELECT u.full_name, u.email, a.balance FROM users u INNER JOIN assets a ON u.id = a.owner_id WHERE u.username = 'john_doe';
SELECT t.transaction_type, b.balance FROM transactions t LEFT JOIN balances b ON t.asset_id = b.asset_id WHERE t.transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';

SELECT t.id, t.transaction_date, a.asset_name, a.asset_type, t.amount FROM transactions t JOIN assets a ON t.asset_id = a.id WHERE t.transaction_type = 'Buy' AND t.amount > 5000 ORDER BY t.amount DESC;
